movie.title: Sewers of Gold
movie.plot: Also known as 'Dirty Money' as well as 'The Great Riviera Bank Robbery'. A group of fervent right wing French nationalists plan to finance a government coup and smash communists by pulling off a daring bank robbery.

events.title: Albert Spaggiari tunnels into a bank vault
